name: mediatracker-ui-enhanced
description: MediaTracker with enhanced UI/UX - A fork of bonukai/MediaTracker with modern design improvements
author: GrowlerGary (fork) | Original: bonukai

scripts.postinstall: cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix server && npm run build --prefix client
scripts.lint: npm run lint --prefix client && npm run lint --prefix server
